includedAssets.title: The Expendables
includedAssets.synopsis: An elite group of unstoppable mercenaries battle tyrannical dictators, rival fighters and ruthless arms dealers in a range of deadly missions. Action with Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham and Arnold Schwarzenegger.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An elite group of mercenaries battle tyrannical dictators, rival fighters and ruthless arms dealers. Sylvester Stallone and Jason Statham star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An elite group of unstoppable mercenaries battle tyrannical dictators, rival fighters and ruthless arms dealers in a range of deadly missions. Action with Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham and Arnold Schwarzenegger.

includedIn.title: The Expendables
includedIn.synopsis: An unstoppable mercenary leads an elite group of highly trained fighters, including an ex-SAS soldier, a martial arts master and a demolitions expert, into a range of deadly missions. As they travel the globe from South America and Nepal to Africa and Eastern Europe, they battle tyrannical dictators, rival mercenaries and ruthless arms dealers. With their skills, each operation should be an easy payday. But in the Expendables' world, things are rarely that simple.

As they travel the globe from South America and Nepal to Africa and Eastern Europe, they battle tyrannical dictators, rival mercenaries and ruthless arms dealers. With their skills, each operation should be an easy payday. But in the Expendables' world, things are rarely that simple.
